import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HomeDetails(_ref){let{getHome}=_ref;const{id}=useParams();const[homeDetails,setHomeDetails]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{// Fetch the home data along with its associated realtor
